note: GDP data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices.
title: Energy use per person vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Energy refers to [primary energy](#dod:primaryenergy), measured in [kilowatt-hours](#dod:watt-hours) per person, using the [substitution method](#dod:substitutionmethod). Gross domestic product (GDP) is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
